select	DISTINCT
	AT26_UNION.FRAUDE	   C1_NROFRAUDE,
	AT26_UNION.CAUSA	   C2_CAUSAFRAUDE,
	AT26_UNION.T_INSTRUMENTO	   C3_TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	AT26_UNION.CANAL	   C4_CANALFRAUDE,
	AT26_UNION.TIPO_FRAUDE	   C5_TIPOFRAUDE,
	AT26_UNION.FRANQUICIA	   C6_TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	AT26_UNION.MTO	   C7_MONTOFRAUDE,
	AT26_UNION.AFECTACION	   C8_AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	AT26_UNION.CTA_CONTABLE	   C9_CODIGOCONTABLE,
	AT26_UNION.T_PERSONA	   C10_TIPOPERSONA,
	AT26_UNION.ID_CLIENTE	   C11_IDCLIENTE,
	AT26_UNION.GENERO	   C12_GENERO,
	CASE
 WHEN TO_NUMBER(AT26_UNION.EDAD) <= 15 THEN '1'
 WHEN TO_NUMBER(AT26_UNION.EDAD) <= 30 THEN '2'
 WHEN TO_NUMBER(AT26_UNION.EDAD) <= 45 THEN '3'
 WHEN TO_NUMBER(AT26_UNION.EDAD) <= 60 THEN '4'
 WHEN TO_NUMBER(AT26_UNION.EDAD) <= 75 THEN '5'
 WHEN TO_NUMBER(AT26_UNION.EDAD) > 75 THEN '6'
 ELSE '0'
END
	   C13_RANGOEDAD,
	CASE
 WHEN AT26_UNION.IVSS IN ('169','179') THEN '2'
 ELSE
 '1'
END	   C14_PENSIONADOIVSS,
	AT26_UNION.RECLAMO	   C15_NRORECLAMO,
	AT26_UNION.FECHA_FRAUDE	   C16_FECHAFRAUDE,
	CASE
 WHEN LENGTH(AT26_UNION.PARROQUIA) < 6 THEN LPAD(AT26_UNION.PARROQUIA,  6, '0')
 ELSE
 AT26_UNION.PARROQUIA
END	   C17_CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	AT26_UNION.NOMBRE	   C18_NOMBRECLIENTE,
	AT26_UNION.OPERACION	   C19_TIPOOPERACION,
	AT26_UNION.MTO_FRAUDE	   C20_MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	AT26_UNION.MTO_FRAUDE_2	   C21_MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	AT26_UNION.RED	   C22_RED
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "AT26_UNION", "LS_AT_STG", "", "D")?>   AT26_UNION
where	(1=1)

select	SYS_GUID(),
	<?=snpRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?>, 
	rowid,
	'S', 
	'1. Si [Tipo de Instrumento Fraude] es igual a 30, 31 y 32, el canal no puede ser 5
2. Si [Tipo de Instrumento Fraude] es igual a 33 el canal no puede ser 3, 5 ni 10
3. Si [Tipo de Instrumento Fraude] es igual a 34 el canal no puede ser 2, 3, 5
4. Si ',
	sysdate,
	'ATS_TH_AT26',
	'Canal Fraude',
	'CK',	
	NROFRAUDE,
	CAUSAFRAUDE,
	TIPOINSTRUMENTO,
	CANALFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRAUDE,
	TIPOFRANQUICIA,
	MONTOFRAUDE,
	AFECTACIONMONETARIA,
	CODIGOCONTABLE,
	TIPOPERSONA,
	IDCLIENTE,
	GENERO,
	RANGOEDAD,
	PENSIONADOIVSS,
	NRORECLAMO,
	FECHAFRAUDE,
	CODIGOPARROQUIA,
	NOMBRECLIENTE,
	TIPOOPERACION,
	MONTOFRAUDEINTERNO,
	MONTOFRAUDEEXTERNO,
	RED,
	CODIGOCUENTA
from	<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "ATS_TH_AT26", "D") ?>  ATS_TH_AT26
where	not 	(
		(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('30','31','32') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('5')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('33') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('3','5','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('34') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('2','3','5')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO IN ('35') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('36','37') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE NOT IN ('1','2','3','5','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('38','39') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','9','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('40','41') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','10')) OR

(ATS_TH_AT26.TIPOINSTRUMENTO  IN ('42','43','44','45','46','47','48','49') AND
ATS_TH_AT26.CANALFRAUDE  NOT IN ('1','2','5','7','9','10'))
		)
